description: Detects execution of chromium based browser in headless mode using the "dump-dom" command line to download files
author: Sreeman
Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: File Download with Headless Browser
query: (process.executable.text:("*\\brave.exe" OR "*\\chrome.exe" OR "*\\msedge.exe" OR "*\\opera.exe" OR "*\\vivaldi.exe") AND process.command_line.text:"*\-\-headless*" AND process.command_line.text:"*dump\-dom*" AND process.command_line.text:"*http*")
